sourcesContent:
// from react library import React, {useEffect, useState} from 'react' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { Link, useParams, useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom' import { Row, Col, Image, ListGroup, Button, Card, Form } from 'react-bootstrap' // from components import Rating from '../components/Rating' import Loader from '../components/Loader' import Message from '../components/Message' // from redux store import { listProductDetails, createProductReview } from '../actions/productActions' import { PRODUCT_CREATE_REVIEW_RESET } from '../constants/productConstants' function ProductScreen() { const history = useNavigate(); const [qty, setQty] = useState(1) const {id} = useParams(); const dispatch = useDispatch() const [rating, setRating] = useState(0) const [comment, setComment] = useState('') const productDetails = useSelector(state => state.productDetails) const { loading, error, product } = productDetails console.log(product) const userLogin = useSelector(state => state.userLogin) const { userInfo } = userLogin const productReviewCreate = useSelector(state => state.productReviewCreate) const { loading: loadingProductReview, error: errorProductReview, success: successProductReview, } = productReviewCreate useEffect(() => { if (successProductReview) { setRating(0) setComment('') dispatch({ type: PRODUCT_CREATE_REVIEW_RESET }) } dispatch(listProductDetails(id)) }, [dispatch, history, successProductReview]) const addToCartHandler = () => { history(`/cart/${id}?qty=${qty}`) } const submitHandler = (e) => { e.preventDefault() dispatch(createProductReview( id, { rating, comment } )) } return (
Go Back { loading ? : error ? {error} : (

{product.name}

 Price: ${product.price} Desc: ${product.description} Price: ${product.price} Status: {product.countInStock > 0 ? 'In-Stock' : 'Out of Stock'} {product.countInStock > 0 && ( Qty setQty(e.target.value)} > { [...Array(product.countInStock).keys()].map((x) => ( )) } )}

Reviews

{product.reviews.length === 0 && No Reviews} {product.reviews.map((review) => ( {review.name}

{review.createdAt.substring(0, 10)}

{review.comment}

 ))}

Write a review

{loadingProductReview && } {successProductReview && Review Submitted} {errorProductReview && {errorProductReview}} {userInfo ? (
Rating setRating(e.target.value)} > Review setComment(e.target.value)} >
) : ( Please login to write a review )}
) }
) } export default ProductScreen
